# Pull Request Checklist

Thank you for contributing! Please check the following before submitting:

- [ ] **Linting**: I have run `uv run ruff check .` and fixed all errors.
- [ ] **Formatting**: I have run `uv run ruff format .` to ensure code style consistency.
- [ ] **Type Checking**: I have run `uv run mypy src` and fixed all type errors.
- [ ] **Tests**: I have added tests for new features/fixes and verified all tests pass (`uv run pytest`).
- [ ] **Documentation**: I have updated the README or Wiki if strictly necessary.
- [ ] **Breaking Changes**: I have noted any breaking changes in the description.

## Description
<!-- Describe your changes here -->
